Package polyglot.ast

Class SwitchBlock_c

java.lang.Object
polyglot.ast.Node_c
polyglot.ast.Term_c
polyglot.ast.Stmt_c
polyglot.ast.AbstractBlock_c
polyglot.ast.SwitchBlock_c
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Block, CompoundStmt, Node, NodeOps, Stmt, SwitchBlock, SwitchElement, Term, TermOps, Copy<Node>
public class SwitchBlock_c
extends AbstractBlock_c
implements SwitchBlock
A SwitchBlock is a list of statements within a switch.

  • Method Details

    • enterScope

      public Context enterScope​(Context c)
      A SwitchBlock differs from a normal block in that declarations made in the context of the switch block are in the scope following the switch block. For example 
       switch (i) {
     case 0:
       int i = 4;
     case 1:
       // i is in scope, but may not have been initialized.
     ...
 }
      Specified by:
      enterScope in interface NodeOps
      Overrides:
      enterScope in class AbstractBlock_c
      Parameters:
      c - the current Context
      Returns:
      the Context to be used for visiting this node.
